title: Does WhatsApp collect user data? - Quora

response.answer_text: Basically Yes. As all the social network and apps that you use, whatsapp collect user data. Thanks to the GDPR now you are able to download all the data that apps and social collects about you. On whatsapp to download the data that it collects about you, you can simply follow theese steps: Tap on the 3 dots and then ‘Settings’Tap on ‘Account’Then from this page you can request account info and in about 3 days you will be able to download it.
